Articles.Content:
Oh, is this an April Fools joke, replacing 'cays' with stars?

Perhaps Nova instigated it, to prevent users from putting 'cay' in front of words

Lol, Nova wishes he'd thought of this one
Might as well play Race Into Space while I wait...

Two options:

(1) They have an update ready for release and are ramping up the hype machine for a second try.

(2) Squad has repeated it's mistake by allowing the media team to start the hype machine without something to release.

If 2 is true, April fools shall not save them.
The excitement for the update is so thick I can taste it. "smacks lips" It.Tastes. Like. MINMUS.

(2) Squad has repeated it's mistake by allowing the media team to start the hype machine without something to release.

When was that?

If you want to REALLY get worked up about something, this update from a few hours ago is the most interesting:

branches/previous/buildid: 130424 Ã¢â‚¬Âº 159708

The last time the previous buildid was updated was mid-December. Just sayin'.

When was that?

first time was the whole 24 hr marathon stream, which usually would predate the update by a few days, a bug came up, they couldn't release, some peeps got mad.
We already have one of those, and it orbits Kerbin... dunno what you want man =P

Im curious, what do the updates to steam mean? I dont have KSP on steam. How does matter? I just dont get it.

Afaik, it's only a way for us mere mortals to have a peek into the updates of the experimentals and when and how often they are updated. Can't really say that I'm reading too much into the level of activity on there and so on though. In the end, there's only a trusted few who truly know what's really going on behind the scenes.

Gah! Check steamdb!!!

Change to public repository!!!!!!!

2 minutes agoChanged Depots

220201/manifests/public: 3620846789892868422 Ã¢â‚¬Âº 6014730364487332298

branches/public/buildid: 159708 Ã¢â‚¬Âº 225089

NEW ANIMATION ON HOME PAGE!!!

EDIT: THIS IS IT!!! It's happening for REAL!!

Edited April 1, 2014 by FlexGunship

If somebody on Squad will say SOMETHING that confirms that it isn't all one big prank that will backfire horribly...

HOLY FLUFF HOLY FLUFF IT'S HERE!!!
Yeah, i got that too, yay! Thanks steam!
http://i.imgur.com/5OV6Bfh.png
Please continue the discussion in our release thread.
